name: SCP-087-3 ver. 2.0
description:
After version 1.0, version 2.0 comes to you more better and more beautiful!

You are D-8452 convicted sex offender, you have been ordered to explore SCP-087.

You are completely on your own and have to see what awaits you, survive it and make the right decision if necessary maybe you will come safely there.

Have fun!

M.C.  Games
